name: Stichting Volkswagen Investors Claim
goal:
The objects of the foundation are to represent the interests of the investors, including but not limited to:
a. ascertaining and researching the course of events leading up to and concerning the intentional and admitted manipulation of software in certain diesel cars from Volkswagen pursuant to which the emission of harmful substances during tests wrongfully fell within the applicable standards and the intentional manipulation of similar software in other cars;
b. ascertaining and researching the financial consequences of the abovementioned for the investors, consisting inter alia of a lossin equity for the investor due to the plunge in the stock exchange rate of securities of Volkswagen AG (including but not limited to shares in the capital of Volkswagen AG);
c. obtaining a declaration of liability by any applicable court that Volkswagen has breached any applicable laws and regulation including but not limited to financial market regulations and any of its obligations towards the investors arising from such legislation;
d. obtaining compensation for the financial consequences for the investors; and
e. doing all that is connected therewith or may be conducive thereto, all to be interpreted in the broadest sense.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks
